code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowSchools=()=>{const[schools,setSchools]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/schools").then(res=>setSchools(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"school-grid",children:schools.map(school=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card bg-white p-3 rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"http://localhost:5000/uploads/".concat(school.image),alt:school.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-bold mt-2",children:school.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[school.address,", ",school.city]})]},school.id))});};export default ShowSchools;
